Item ID1325

The steel scimitar is a scimitar made by using 2 steel bars on an anvil, as long as you have a hammer and at least level 35 Smithing, granting 75 experience. Players can purchase this scimitar from Zeke's Superior Scimitars in Al Kharid.

Players require 5 Attack to wield steel weapons.
